title: Longbow Proficiency
content:
Longbow Proficiency Effect Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with longbows. Requirements Elf

Longbow Proficiency

Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with longbows.

Longbow Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
